trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Salida has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: Salida's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). Salida can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
